values:
i love how i can draw aimlessly while half paying attention in class.. AND IT'S AWESOME!! but then suddenly i have to crank and purposefully draw characters for something important... and i can't do anything good at all... 

waaaiiii?

also i sliced my thumb open like a complete idiot like five minutes ago with an x-acto knife.... a;kfja;dlkjfakdfj dumb dumb dumb

Since it's valentine's day... and I'm all by my lonesome (as usual) i thought i'd waste my time and whoever reads this' time by posting on el jay.. blah!

gotta say... v-day cuts in a bit deeper now after having two roommates with insanely romantical boyfriends....which is adorable and sweet and i'm so happy/jealous that they've found their other halves.. but jeesus.... i don't want to hear about it.... -stabs self repeatedly-

the boys i have contact with are increasingly retarded.... it must be a daap thing.. i dunno.. but i've discovered i never want to date in my major and i want to date someone older then me... only because i know they will be mentally mature enough to be around.... i know there are exceptions but seriously... it's like being around 5 year old monkeys O_O

this also seems magnified by the fact that i'm the only other single girl in my class that isn't a complete whore.. therefore COMPLETELY ON THE MARKET..and apparently touchable.... O_O i'm serious... there are 6 girls in my class... two are dating happily (my roommates), one is married, one is a lesbian, and the other is sophisticated/unattainable/obnoxious....then there's me.... 

i'm sorry.. but i thought it was common knowledge that people have personal bubbles in which they do not like to be prodded, poked, petted, etc etc.... apparently i'm the pillsbury dough boy to the guys.. they like poking me, petting my hair, scaring me, having insanely close conversations a;ldksfja;lsdkfjad;lkfj 

it's all very flattering if it wasn't so fifth grade... ugh.. i will literally kick the next guy in the balls... whatever happened to maturely wooing the girl...instead of like...feeling her up in order to gauge interest...ugh...

so not interested... stop thinking you're ladies men... because you aren't... and you make me throw up in my mouth a little...

in other news i can't wait to get the hell out of daap and into a major i'm completely interested in and hopefully a different set of guys.... because the ones i know at the moment make me want to die... repeatedly...

all i want is a nice, somewhat older guy, preferably in another major so we have other things to talk about, who respects my personal space until i'm ready, that showers on a regular basis, isn't into the whole growing-weird-facial-hair-just-because-i'm-in-college-now thing, is funny without needing to be the complete center of attention, sweet, goes into the sunlight, doesn't hate animals, and makes the first move in a non-fifth-grader-way because i'm shy and old-fashioned... it's a lot.. but that's all i'm asking for..

doesn't seem like he exists yet though...sigh

in other other news i am torn.... do i want to be a filmmaker or a concept artist? do i want calarts or do i want art center? in my heart i want calarts so badly.... i think if i don't get in i will be beyond devastated...like.. the point of not eating...purposefully sleeping a lot/coma...hating my life devastated....god what will i do if it's a rejection letter? besides jumping off a cliff .. it means i'm stuck in daap for the rest of my college life....and no one wants that....i can't be an industrial designer... i hate it with every fiber of my being.. it's a complete chore in the mornings just to wake up with the knowledge that i have class that day... FOCUSED ENTIRELY ON THE THING I HATE MOST IN LIFE... the only time i bounce out of bed with a skip in my step is for figure drawing... where i can actually breath.. and be myself.. and completely excel!!!!! it's wonderful and i love it so much and my teacher is so awesome and pushing the way i visually approach a figure... 

ugh... daap would be a little easier to stomach i think.... if the teachers were actually legit.. but they aren't... i'm not usually a cocky bastard about my art... but if i can outdraw my professors... then i have no respect for them.. if they have nothing to teach me that i haven't already taught myself in my free time they're not worth my time.... and the fact that the beginning of every class starts with the professor saying "if you don't live and breath sustainability and design and blah doobey doo blah then you shouldn't be here" and I'm like "uh huh... i'm in complete agreement.. i shouldn't be here"

if it weren't for my parents i would've backhanded my design communications teacher with my laptop and marched right out of class already... if not for the fact he's a horrible teacher it's the fact that he has no respect for people at all... the shit he said alone about suicide makes me want to get his ass fired.. but he's on tenure... FUCK TENURE.. if a teacher has reached that point in their lives they shouldn't be teaching... i don't care how hot shit you were in the 80s... it's a different time period old man... people use goddamn photoshop and illustrator now to kick your gauche ass...

a;dlsfja;dlkfjad; makes me so angry.... 

sigh... man i just get on el jay and it's like.. woooooosh everything i've had bottled up comes railing out..... it's very therapeutic... there.. now you know what bothers my on a daily basis.. grabby boys, fuckwit professors, and acceptance woes....

don't even get me started on co-op... or lack there of.... i keep having nightmares about ending up in mcdonalds flipping burger patties.... 

Dear Economy,
GO FUCK YOURSELF.
no love,
Erin

seriously... i'm not going to get a job.... there are no jobs.. people get calls in the morning like "yay welcome to the company you have an internship" then four hours later they get called back "jk jk jk we have no monies sucks to be you kbye"

especially considering my list is this for co-ops:

Disney 
Pixar
Nickelodeon
Dreamworks
Bluesky
DC
Marvel
Disney Imagineering
Mattel


and the fact that my co-op advisors only reply to my MILLIONS OF FREAKOUT EMAILS was "contacted mattel, will hear more later"

also hahahaha to every single animation studio/comic job because they are complete dreams that will never happen.. i have a better chance of being disney's assistant to the assistant of the assistant janitor omg .... but my co-op advisor had to butter me up with having all these wonderful contacts at these places...... :( but these places want animation students not character drabbling hates-their-major id students.....

FUCK... i should have been more realistic... especially when my only reasonable co-op venture is mattel... and they're completely tanking in the economy... :(

i am going to be a hobo...




meh


hahaha.... i like how i start with happy valentine's day and end with OMGWTFBBQ job panic...such is life

merry christmas!!!

man.... i took in a lot of awesome swag this year... which was unexpected..as my parents and i had set goals with money..but they got me the bestest things ever!!!! 

i got the art of kung fu panda (which is beautiful omg) and the art of Bolt (which i can't look at yet because i have yet to see the movie...so i don't want to spoil myself) and then of course wall-e, dark knight and iron man dvds... and an EVE DOLL!!! because my cousin is awesome...

you'd think a nine year old boy was just made very very happy today by the stuff i raked in.. sheesh i need to grow up.... 

but after spending today looking through arts/watching movies....i'm torn between being really really inspired to wanting to just jump off a cliff with feeling talentless...

this combination is only furthered by these people i keep finding online who are my age or younger who are way too awesome .... i need to get my ass out of daap and into a better school.... a;ldkfa;dkfj i'm only going so far on my own... i want teachers and classes and classmates that are relevant to my interests.. none of this goddamn industrial design stuff... plbbbtttttt i want character design.. good GOD i NEED set design classes... backgrounds, perspective, figure drawings, landscapes... uh huh huh huh... not fair...

and i look at stuff like this http://www.blithegirl.deviantart.com/ where this girl is obviously at some animation school in california....and my age .....makes me feel like some talentless hack....

March 1st through April 1st needs to come right now.... just end my misery and let me know i didn't get in already... criminy i'm dying with the wait... in the meantime i'm applying for this: http://corporate.disney.go.com/careers/walt_disney_animation_studios_intern_info.html

HA! like that'll happen... :/



wow.. when i rant.. i rant... i'm too negative/worried for my own good... meef.. whatever happens..happens... i know i'm going to go somewhere...i just want it to happen sooner....

glad i never wasted money to see speed racer in theaters.... still loling over the fact that Rain was in it...

in other news.... Matt Rhodes who did the character design for Mass Effect is my new inspiration.... i don't even play video games...but this guys vision and style is sick
http://www.rhodesbros.net/mattart.html
http://www.creativeuncut.com/art_mass-effect_a.html


i wonder if i can get a co-op at bioware....problem is they want the gamers....and i am not a gamer... i just want to draw for them...like woah


co-ops to try for but probably will never get a payed internship with in order to qualify...let alone even be considered for (because i'm so positive about these things):
Disney
Mass Effect
Bioware
Marvel
DC
Blue Sky
Nickelodeon
basically....ANYTHING CHARACTER DESIGN!!!!! 

oh hay...calarts... stop being so expensive...where's that insanely rich yet obscure relative whom i've never met but loves me dearly and has left their frillions of dollars as well as their awesome estate all in my name!?!??!? damnit...i was born into the wrong family...... in other news...now would be a great time for angelina jolie and brad pitt to get their adopting butts in gear and find me....even though i am now 20 and not from a completely desolate country...i also don't have a name with the letter x in it.....but...i'm in ohio!!! that's got to count for something... :/


and loving frank by nancy horan is really good....but being the horrible book person i am...i already peaked ahead...and i know it's not going to end well....i don't really want to finish it now.. oops sorry mamah and frank lloyd wright....

mmmmmm hullo..... wanted to waste time... so here:



meme thing gangked from bri-chan 

01] What is your pen name?
Burnbadart

02] How did you get the name?
I needed a new aim name to replace mccartneyobass. My parents have a poster hanging up on the stairwell that had the words burn your bad art...and so it was born.

03] Do you use PC or Mac?
both i guess. because i use bootcamp on my mac in order to do 3D modeling stuff on alias and solidworks for school... but i prefer Mac over PC anyday!!!

04] What software do you use most often?
PHOTOSHOP CS2!!! and CS3...but only at work because i can't afford to upgrade on my laptop. :/

05] Do you use mouse, or tablet?
My tablet.... oh dear gawd...i couldn't do anything with a mouse.

06] The color you use most often is?
browns, black, indigo and grays...so..all the boring colors.... they're my go tos for sketching, etc.  but i'll use a mix of everything depending on what the art ends up being.

07] What area of the pictures do you put most effort into?
I like to go into crazy details with the clothing and pushing the poses and expressions.  Probably most effort goes into the outfits (at the moment).

08] How long does it take you do draw a picture?
Depends... sketches can take me like a minute.. but full blown awesome beautiful finished pieces can be anywhere from a day to days/months/forever.  mostly because of freetime and also if i'm in the groove... i can bang that thing out in like 4 hours tops...thank you work for pushing my speed and skill level :)

09] Do you keep your rough drafts?
ALWAYS...in layers...or in my sketchbooks.  i love my rough sketches.  my finished pieces are always very stiff..which is something i'm trying to work on and that i'm getting better with... but i just like to be able to see my process and look back on them.

10] What kind of font do you use most often?
M something...myriad i think... which might make a graphic designer keel over dead...whatev...

11] What's the dpi when you scan?
300 dpi... even if it eats my memory...

12] Do you do anything else when you're drawing pictures?
I'm a multitasker.  I'll listen to music, watch tv, take random internet breaks, eat and drink, etc.

13] How many pictures do you draw in a month?
um...a lot....like...for serious... probably in the hundreds... this is if you're taking every freaking doodle i leave everywhere every second of the day... seriously.. i doodle at restaurants, i doodle at work when i'm supposed to be doodling other stuff, i doodle when i'm shopping markers at michael's, i doodle at home, on my friend's paper/notebooks/homework, i doodle on my own homework...on my arms... if you haven't gotten this yet.. I DRAW ALL THE TIME...and on ANY THING.

14] What kind of paper do you draw your pictures on?
is this meme about scanning drawings in mainly? because i love to draw with the wacom as well... i'll just do the undersketch and lineart straight into photoshop.  but i draw on just about whatever i get my hands on.... printer paper mostly..which is bad because my sketchbook is so full of loose leaf it's falling apart....i can't draw in sketchbooks.. it's like i freeze up when my paper is in bound form....and i have a soft spot for lined paper and newsprint... so everything bad for sketches.... napkins and post its too.... sheesh....things that would never look good no matter how you present it in your portfolio :/

15] What kind of paper do you use for sketches and drafts?
#14

16] How long does it take to ink something?
I don't really "ink" something.... like lineart?on pencil sketches? not really my thing... i draw with ballpoint a lot though.. and linearting in photoshop takes me a bit....if i want it to look spanking awesome... 

17] Do you do doujinshi or original manga?
no....i'm trying to keep away from anime.... 

18] Do you like doujinshi? Is it fun making it?
bleh

19] Ever submitted anything to a magazine?
i don't think so...

20] Did it get published?
meh

21] Who are your favorite artists?
Alphonse Mucha, Earl Oliver Hurst, the star wars concept artists, marvel and dc guys...

22] What's your favorite Anime/Manga?
avatar the last airbender? does that even count? ....i don't think i read this meme well... 

23] Favorite Characters?
duurr... catwoman

24] Any artists that you'd like to draw like?
everyone and anyone that's better then me.....so... a lot of people.... mainly to be able to draw and express myself like the disney/pixar folks do...

25] Do you buy books a lot?
way too many books.... i'm on a NO BOOK BUYING thing right now... because i need all the money i can save up right now... :/

26] Did you ever buy a book to inspire you to draw?
uh yah.... all the art nouveau books i can get my hands on, i got the star wars concept books from my dad, pixar movie books, earl oliver hurst poster book, top illustrator thing book, costume/fashion books, nickelodeon book.....LOTS OF BOOKS

27] Any video games you enjoy?
...i like mario kart i guess.... sims? i don't really have a gaming system... so no?

28] Any favorite characters from video games?
the ones from guitar hero....i love the artist that did that guitar hero commercial....he does the stuff for gorillaz.... i should probably know this.. bleh

29] Do you have a favorite writer?
JD Salinger hands down

30] Any books you really enjoy?
i'm a sucker for young adult... it's horrible because i'm not fourteen anymore... so now i'm trying to force myself to read tasteful literature...i'm slowly trucking through the english patient right now... after tearing through cold mountain WHICH WAS AWESOME!!....so... tasteful literature isn't so bad... i'm just a person that judges books by their covers... WHICH IS HORRIBLE... i know... but tasteful literature never has fun covers.. YA always has great illustrations... sometimes that's the only reason i buy some of those books...

31] Do you write fanfics?
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA

32] Any music that you often listen to while drawing?
i have a soundtrack that goes along with my infinite plot hole movie/comic/book/tvshow art thing called the immortals arc at the moment.... so all kinds of songs.. mostly Muse though and a lot of depeche mode at the moment.. weird...ummm and always always coldplay

33] Any recommended songs?
starlight, enjoy the silence, where is my mind, paper planes, viva la vida

34] Any web sites that you totally admire?
mmm...facebook? harr

35] Do you have any sites you want to go to every day?
yeah... i check eljay friends list for updates, deviantart to stalk, facebook like every hour..which is sad, yahoo and uc email....um...youtube...

36] What is your dream site like?
forget dream site... my dream is to begin to fathom how to make a site...and then i'll dream it up.... i am so computer/internet illiterate....

37] Do you like your own art?
usually....but then i see someone better...and always younger then me..and then i hate myself for the rest of the week...

46] Are you a computer expert?
at photoshop....and time wasting.. :)

47] Want to become a professional artist?
YES YES YES...more then i want to continue breathing

48] Any other jobs you're interested in, besides illustration?
not really interested in illustration... i just want to do character design

49] Any other specialties besides drawing?
i've learned i can cook, i'm good at naps, and i'm sometimes a fun person to hang out with? wow.. i am so screwed if someone chops my right hand off... i have no career options outside of art...

50] Do you like to watch movies?
very much so... hence wanting so much to be in the entertainment biz....pixar, disney, nickelodeon, lucasfilm, marvelfilm... O_O

51] What's your favorite movie?
at the moment it's between stardust and the incredibles.... but if you asked me when i was like.. 7 or 8 it was hands down, no questions, definitely the lion king

52] Have you ever entered art contests?
yep.. through school.... and that's it...

53] When did you start drawing seriously?
i've drawn since i could pick up a crayon...serious serious drawing....it depends... i didn't really consider art seriously until highschool....i was really leaning towards equine/vet or writing/english for a long long time...even though i loved to and excelled at art... hmmmm....i think because as cool as my parents were being toy designers i wanted to do something different and not art related.... so much for that..... i still don't want to be a toy designer..no matter how strong its siren call.... (DAMN YOU HASBRO) but now i will cut off my leg before being anything but art related...and really i just me character design....for reals... CUT OFF MY LEG... i'll totally do it.... 

54] Anything that you often use as a reference when you draw?
myself...and inspiration images....i'll pull from online or books around me or people around me... just to get ideas from how others draw, how something looks etc...NOT TO COPY...NEVER TO COPY

55] Have you met any of your fans online?
i don't think i have any fans online...because i'm a lameass...oh and i don't have time to post anything online because i actually have a paying job where i get to draw characters everyday until january.... hmmmm... i'll take that over 12 year old fangirls anyday... i love you hasbro....maybe too much...

56] You have a lot of pen pals?
no? i keep up with friends on facebook...but i don't think that really counts....

57] You have a lot of friends that draw?
at school yes... outside of school...also yes

58] What time do you usually go online?
all day.....it's an addiction...

59] Do you like to go to chat rooms?
no

60] Do you have your own computer?
yes..and a brand spanking new huge awesome monitor..that i can't use right now because it wouldn't fit in my car/i would never haul it out to massachusetts for fear of breaking it/having someone steal it on the way over

61] What would you say to the person you admire?
marry me.... no..i'm not sure...i'm sure i'd just beam at them and be completely incoherent...

62] Do you think of things when you draw?
i actually keep up a constant monologue in my head...it's weird..and exhausting.... i can't go blank... there's always too much going on etc...

63] Have you drawn badly because you think too much?
no...i usually draw badly because i just ....draw badly sometimes...when i'm out of the groove....

64] Do you have any friends who are professionals?
yep

65] Where do you often hang out?
home or work..laaammmeee

66] Do you have any artists that you don't like too much?
anime artists make me vomit my own intestinal tract... i hate it i hate it i hate it... and i hate that they're talentless but omg sooo popular :p ugh

67] Situations in which you really don't like being online?
when my eyes are ready to bleed...

68] Situations you hate when it comes to having web sites?
ummm....i don't really have my own "website" but...i guess i don't like people being general assholes... this counts for facebook mainly....

69] Something that makes you really glad that the Internet exists?
you can find anything at the click of a button....it's amazing

70] What about things that make you NOT glad that the Internet exists?
the fact that i can't live without it now..

71] What's the first picture you've ever shown to the public online?
hahahahahaha sushi girl......seriously...hahaha

72] Do you still have that?
yep....it's still collecting dust on my book shelf.... :)

73] Has your drawing style changed a lot?
OH THANK GAWD YES!!! i would hope it has.....please tell me it has.....

74] How does it usually change?
through school, constant sketching and inspiration, and definitely through work

75] Have you experienced artists block before?
all the freaking time

76] How did you escape from it?
i have to take a break from drawing and do something different...which is hard at work.. so i'll just take a walk around the office and say hi to some people..then head back and try again...

77] What happens when you have artists block?
i hate myself and i just want to do something else...take a nap....i dunno

78] Any artists that have influenced you a lot?
alphonse mucha.....and people say i have a very anime style.. WHICH I HATE...and i'm constantly working to change that...ugggghhhh

79] What made you start drawing?
my parents probably....i grew up under their drafting table... it was inevitable

80] What made you want to get a web site?
i don't have a real website of my own yet... but i got a deviantart one mainly for the interaction you get with better artists... i learned so much from deviantart...even though people poo poo it... i've gotten a lot of constructive criticism (and a lot of gibbering too)...but it's so full of inspiration and so many different styles to look at and help to mold your own.... but... now i'm kind of sick of the whole deviantart mentality...and i'm embarrassed to even mention my page on there because i have fanart on there...it's not very professional....i need to make my own website...

81] Where did your site name come from?
from that same im screenname...oh so long ago in middleschool...which is also my email and go to name for whatever i troll about on the internet.... mostly porn... JUST KIDDING... O_O

82] What do you think about net manners?
..........umm...i have good net manners? i don't really antagonize people on the internet i don't know...and i don't get involved with shit....

83] Have you ever been spammed?
yep

84] Ever thought about quitting your web page?
pretty much have...except that i go back once in a while to clear out my inbox and see what new deviations are out there....i haven't uploaded anything in a long while.... :/

85] If so, why?
i don't have time anymore...i have a life now..sort of... i've got a job..and when i'm at school and not on co-op my free time is pretty much shot...

86] About how many KB is each picture?
i have no idea....i always do 300dpi...which is wrong wrong wrong....

87] When creating your site, do you use a program or pure html?
baahahahaha i'm too dumb to even grasp that....i need to get websites for idiots...or pay someone to make me a webpage... :/

88] Do you have good eyesight?
hahahhahahahah no....i wear contacts...and even with those..i feel like my eyes are falling out...and i'm constantly getting blinder and blinder

89] If you can get any person's autograph, whose would you get?
JONAS BROTHERS!!!!..jk..jk... honestly i don't know.... don't really care...

90] What would you say to that artist when he/she autographs for you?
...........

91] Do you have fans of your art?
probably not

92] Do you like to draw on oekaki bbs?
i can't even figure oekaki out.....bleh

93] Were you good at art in school?
i would gander and a yes

94] Did you take art lessons other than from school?
yes.... life drawing classes

95] Have you drawn a manga?
no

96] What's your favorite phrase/quote?
"hello hello hello hello hello hello hello hello hello hello hello love and kisses Chales" from JD salinger's nine stories...for esme with love and squalor..

97] Do you think your personality is different externally and internally?
yes....i'm a extroverted introvert...it depends on the situation...i can be outgoing or i can be very shy... my achilles heel is that i'm very self conscious and really hard on myself.... :/

98] What's your goal now?
get into CalArts....but for spring quarter get a paid co-op with disney or lucasfilm or nickelodeon or dreamworks or blue sky

99] What do you have to say to yourself?
DURGA DURGA BADURGA DURGGGGGGG..and i'm tired

100] Lastly, what do you have to say to everyone?
who the heck is reading this? i only did this because i'm extrememly bored....and drained from all day drawing...so am now in amoeba mode.... duurrrr

so this is like... too late...but... finally caught the avatar finale...and it was EPIC

i'm actually completely over the whole zutara vs kataang thing........ mai was really cute... and katara just has poor taste in men/boys XD

;aldksfja;kldfja; but mike and bryan... where is URSA!?!?!? don't leave me on a complete cliffy like that D:


and azula... holy shit... she went completely unhinged and all joker at the end..it was crazy!!!!


also... dark knight... i feel as though i need to see this repeatedly...because it was that hardcore....


blergh in other news...i'm twenty? ho shit

Your result for The Classic Dames Test...

Katharine Hepburn

You are the fabulously quirky and independent woman of character. You go your own way, follow your own drummer, take your own lead. You stand head and shoulders next to your partner, but you are perfectly willing and able to stand alone. Others might be more classically beautiful or conventionally woman-like, but you possess a more fundamental common sense and off-kilter charm, making interesting men fall at your feet. You can pick them up or leave them there as you see fit. You share the screen with the likes of Spencer Tracy and Cary Grant, thinking men who like strong women.

Find out what kind of classic leading man you'd make by taking the Classic Leading Man Test.

bleh

uff... that was the shortest break between work and school ever.. and it was all spent driving across pennsylvania and moving into the new house... barf

school should be fun though...we have to make a power tool...i'm thinking hand mixer..

and my kitten's name is Monty......also little one, crazy butt, love muffin, count of monte cristo, monty python, montasaurus rex, monteray jack, goober, bunny, and ickles

i love his stupid face so much....even if he's left claw marks all over my arm and back.....and toes.... :/ sigh
-watches Monty try to eat his tail- he's not the smartest one...but he makes up for it with crazy...and cuteness.....he's got a freaking orange heart on his back.... how can he not be cute!!??!?

hmmmmm i'm thinking it's sandwich time.....

bah ha ha ha... working on clone wars is sucking me into the deep and nerdy dark path that is the star wars fanbase..... AH HA HA HAHHH AHHA


although i have to admit...kit fisto and aayla secura are the best couple ever.....and the movies should've just been about obi-wan... BECAUSE HE IS JUST THAT BAD ASS and hawt.... -eats ewan mcgregor-

and i am in love with shaak ti's character design...LURVVVVV :O

also in a love hate relationship with Grievous' character design....if only for the fact that i spent over an hour rendering his freaking crotch XD

um and anakin and padme's relationship is gross... like....extra gross -has totally been lured into obidala-



hmmmmm in other news... holy shit... i didn't know robert downey jr. was in the hulk movie?!?!?! my GAWD... if they weren't tempting me enough with edward norton and freaking liv tyler -falls over and dies with happiness-
i love you marvel....so freaking much

i can't wait to go home i can't wait to go home i can't wait to go home!!!!! last day is on tuesday...then home home home home home!!!!!!! -bounces all over the place- and guess who i get to meet when i get home!?!????? -foams- my dad found him in the gutter on the side of the street.....calls me friday morning on my way to work..."i found a kitten do you want him?" i'll take it as karma, a sign from god, whatever.....i'm just so happy to have something to hold in my arms again :/

hmm.... am trying this thing called exercise....and it's a bitch

immortals plot:
powers and names ....also apt to change

-hides the fact that he is immortal by masquerading as a "normal"..comes to the groups aid at random intervals..sort of follows in the shadows in the beginning but later in the story becomes a big part of the group... falls in love with Piper throughout the adventures...feels they can never be together because of what he is..

can copy and retain any power= still unnamed (16)
- main protagonist of the story...begins as the enemies secret weapon...gets amnesia by accidental destruction of the base he's housed at...taken under Piper's wing..and through their adventures slowly starts regaining his memory..and regains the powers he has collected so far....adventures turn into a quest to find the rest of the immortals in order to gain the knowledge needed to return the world to it's former way...basically save mankind...(as usual) ....has a moment where he reverts to "evil"....

is a "finder"= Evey..pronounched eh-vee (14 or 15)
-hostage turned part of the group...daughter of the "good" side's leader..with the power to locate any person, place, or thing... taken "hostage" by piper, "copycat", james, and robot? in order to help find the immortals as well as other key places and people....falls in love with "copycat" ....

either a robot or Piper's twin brother? who knows.....the group in the beginning needs to be three= still unnamed (meh)

immortals so far: future, past, healing, creation, power.............(together they make captain planet!! -shot)
original deaths/rebirths into immortality:
occur when the world begins to visibly decay....and by decay i mean enormous loss and horror occurs in history to the human race or to the earth itself...
#1 future - i really want her to be from the middle ages.. 
#2 past - meh?
#3 healing - was a slave
#4 creation - meh? i'm thinking this ones the leader of the enemies?
#5 power - ww1 or ww2

bad guys are both the so called "enemies" and "good side" both groups are corrupt ...made up of the remains of countries.....especially those that had tension.....
so like.... united states/canada/europe,etc.. would be the so called "good side" ....middle east/asia/russia, etc.. would be the so called "enemies"
most countries have been destroyed to the point of no man's lands and just plain battle zones.....there are no named countries in this time period...no races... people are referred to by powers or lack there of... so:
"elites" are those with powers in the "military" ..
"normals" are the powerless.... 
"renegades" are those with powers that choose neither side and have escaped the military they were raised to fight in....
"immortals" are people who upon their first death continue to live in that original age and body but gain immense power...they cannot die...or..well...only the "fifth" immortal can take away their immortality.....immortals are brought into the world when exceptionally horrible things occur that take away from the earth in a manner that can't be reversed....?
